title: Marie Magdalens loue
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter: and are to be sold [by W. Barley] in Gratious street nere Leaden Hall Gate,
notes: Bookseller's name and publication date from colophon.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
"A solemne passion of the soules loue", in verse, has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
